actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of enabling recipients of grants under such title to utilize such grants with respect to governmental buildings, and for the purpose of providing for the adjustment of geographic boundaries of standard metropolitan statistical areas.

summary.text: Allows recipients of grants under the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 to utilize such grants for the construction of public buildings and facilities. Permits the Secretary of Housing and Urban Development to modify the geographic boundaries of a metropolitan area upon the request of the Governor of the State in which such area is located, in order to specify the portions of such area which are not essentially metropolitan.

titles.title: A bill to amend title I of the Housing and Community Development Act of 1974 for the purpose of enabling recipients of grants under such title to utilize such grants with respect to governmental buildings, and for the purpose of providing for the adjustment of geographic boundaries of standard metropolitan statistical areas.
